button.pay.description: Button text for paying the order.

button.continuePay.description: Button text for continuing to pay the order.

button.checkDetail.description: Button text for viewing order details.

button.query.description: Button text for querying the order.

button.finish.description: Button text for manually completing the order.

button.update.description: Button text for updating the order.

field.amount.description: The point amount of the order.

field.price.description: The point amount of the order.

field.createdAt.description: The creation time of the order.

field.payWay.description: The payment method for the order.

field.proxy.description: An online service for data transmission using HTTP proxy.

message.orderExpired.message: The order has expired, please create a new order to pay.

message.wechatPayHelp.message: Please open WeChat on your phone and scan to complete the payment.

message.buyInExternalUrl.message: Please complete the payment via the external link.
message.buyInExternalUrl.description: Message for payment via external link.

message.confirmFinish.message: This operation will manually set the order to paid status and complete distribution, and cannot be undone. Please confirm the customer has completed the payment. Do you want to continue?

state.pending.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order is still waiting for user payment.

state.paid.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order has been paid.

state.finished.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order has been completed.

state.expired.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order has expired.

state.failed.description: The status of the order, indicating that this order payment failed.

title.info.description: Title used for the website that indicates order information.

title.wechatPay.description: Title used for the website that indicates WeChat payment.

title.aliPay.description: Title used for the website that indicates Alipay payment, Alipay payment is an online payment method.

title.stripe.description: Title used for the website that indicates Stripe payment, Stripe payment is an online payment method.

title.manageOrder.description: Title used for the website that indicates managing orders.
